name: 楊神珠
objective:
The Learning objectives are as follows:
1.	To learn key content/context /concept about Marketing in theory and in real-world application. And understand the change of marketing concepts and definitions to adopt the idea that Marketing is the art and science combination, 
2.	This course will also entail the main types of marketers and markets, and how they prospect into the marketplace. While in the marketplace, how the sellers and buyers are connected, and extend in target markets in a holistic approach.
3.	With the corporate core value proposition, students will appropriate the key elements with the course process to design a suggested proper Semester-Long marketing plan project. 
4.	Topics to pay attention to: the Core Marketing Concepts, Marketing Environment, both inside and outside the organization, TPS, Brands and offerings, Value and Satisfaction, Societal forces, Marketing Channel, Supply Chain, and other competition watch, which may affect the marketing result.
